attributes.action: Enforce a telivision warning of ' This program contains "obscene" language' to replace "strong" language.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The description in the current warning that a telivision program contains strong language is a misnomer as stong can be construed as being positive,and is nondescript.

The word obscene is more descriptive of the language referred to, and its use would convey the program content
more accurately, which may help a rise in standards, and give less credance to everyday use of four letter words.
